GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/users/:username.description: serves an object of the user data for the input username

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object of a specific article dictated by input endpoint

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments for the input article id

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an object of the newly posted comment from the comments table
